sentences.sContent: Mather was a film critic for many years.
sentences.sCn: 马瑟做过多年的电影评论家。

sentences.sContent: ...There are two ways to interpret Plutarch when he suggests that a critic should be able to produce a better in its place...
...I was lucky enough to find a critic and teacher who was willing to make the journey of writing with me...

synos.tran: 批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人

remMethod.val: crit(判断) ＋ ic → 判断是非 → 批评家

words.tran: 鉴定的；[核] 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的
精密地；危急地；批评性地；用钻研眼光地

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to make judgments about the good and bad qualities of art, music, films etc
